name: Nova AI
description: Nova AI is a DePIN-native network that enables the next generation of autonomous AI agents through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). Featuring secure context windows, tool binding, and on-chain verification, Nova allows agents to perform complex tasks across decentralized infrastructure with speed and reliability. Powered by $NOVA for execution and tool access, the network delivers a scalable framework where context, compute, and control converge to bridge AI intelligence with real-world systems.
